Research Statement

#South India

Traditional Food for All?: Heritage & Food Culture in South India

This project is focused on understanding the salience of concepts of tradition and modernity in relation to changing diets and food culture in and around the city of Madurai in Tamil Nadu, South India.

#Anthropology

Research Statement

It has been a very slow and gradual process. I think from the outside some people think it was really quick, but you’ve known me for quite some time and know that I’ve been playing music for over ten years.
